metadata.title: CVE-2022-2588 on Ubuntu 20.04 ESM (focal) - high
metadata.description:
It was discovered that the cls_route filter implementation in the Linuxkernel would not remove an old filter from the hashtable before freeing itif its handle had the value 0.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-2588` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-5.4.0-124-generic - 5.4.0-124.140
